profile.TITLE: Profile
profile.MOBILE_DESC:
Please enter your mobile phone number (e.g. +41791234567). You will need it if you decide to send SMS over the web or receive SMS reminders on your mobile phone.

Please click on "Request code" to receive a validation code on your mobile phone via SMS. As soon as you get the code, please enter it into the "Validate mobile" field and click on the "Validate" button.

In case you do not get any validation code, please make sure that the mobile number which you entered is correct and click on "Request code" again.
profile.NAME_ERROR: First name can not be empty
profile.maxLengthText: The maximum length for this field is {0}

languageTimeDate.DESC: Set your time zone and date preferences.

mail.GENERAL_DESC: Define the settings for reading and sending your email.
mail.READ_FIRST_MAIL: Show first mail in preview pane

mail.REPLY_QUOTING: Plain text message includes original message in reply

mail.ACCOUNT_WARNING: We were unable to connect to your account
mail.ACCOUNT_AD_HELP_TEXT: You can change the default settings to access this email account (for non-standard configurations only)
mail.ACCOUNT_SERVER_TYPE_TIP:
Tips

Check which protocol your email provider uses:

  • IMAP (more likely) lets you see all your foleders and keep emails synchronoised accross your devices (leaving your emails at the other server)
  • POP only lets you see your emails on one device (so your emails will be removed from the sources server)

aliases.TITLE: Aliases
aliases.DESC: Create multiple identities for outgoing mail.

disposableAddress.TITLE: Disposable email addresses
disposableAddress.DESC: Use disposable email addresses if you don't want to share your real Mail address. If a disposable address starts getting spam, just delete it. Once you have deleted an address you won't be able to use that name again.
disposableAddress.SUB_TITLE: Create and manage your disposable email addresses
disposableAddress.MAX_NUMB_SUFFIX: email addresses, deliver your incoming email into specific folders and choose whether any rules you've set up apply to those addresses

calendar.TITLE: Calendar
calendar.DESC: Set your preferred settings for new calendars and events. Reminders will be sent by email.
calendar.CALENDAR_SETTING_INFO: Set your preferred settings for new calendars, events and tasks. Any reminders set will be sent by email to your mail inbox.
calendar.AUTO_EMPTY_TRASH_LOGOUT: Automatically empty trash when logging out

saveSettings.TITLE: Save Settings
saveSettings.DESC: Do you want to save settings?

blockImage.TITLE: Block images
blockImage.DESC: You can choose to automatically block images on incoming messages
blockImage.LABEL: Block options

blockedSenders.TITLE: Blocked senders
blockedSenders.DESC: Block senders from whom you don't want to receive email.
blockedSenders.SUB_DESC: You can block an email address (e.g. name@example.com) or a domain (e.g. example.com). Select an existing item to delete it
blockedSenders.MATH_ERROR: Please enter either a valid email address or a valid domain.

whiteList.TITLE: Safe senders
whiteList.DESC: Approve senders from whom you want to receive email.
whiteList.SUB_DESC: You can approve an email address (e.g. name@example.com) or a domain (e.g. example.com). Select an existing item to delete it
whiteList.MATH_ERROR: Please enter either a valid email address or a valid domain.

rules.TITLE: Rules
rules.DESC: Add rules to organize your incoming email. Select an existing rule to edit, delete or move.
rules.RULE_CONFIRM_DELETE: Are you sure you want to delete the rule?

rule_detail.TITLE_DESC: Name and set the conditions and action of rule
rule_detail.NAME: Rule name
rule_detail.DELETE_DESC: Delete email but don't notify sender
rule_detail.REJECT_DESC: Reject email and send non-delivery notification to sender
rule_detail.ACTION_INFO: If you forward or send a notification a copy of your email will be stored in your inbox.
rule_detail.STOP_DESC: If a message matches this rule, do not use remaining rules

mailForward.TITLE: Auto-forward
mailForward.DESC: Automatically forward all incoming email to other email addresses. To specify several, separate each one with a comma.
mailForward.KEEP_COPY_DESC: Keep a copy in your inbox
mailForward.MATH_ERROR: Please enter a valid email address

signature.TITLE: Signature
signature.DESC: Create multiple email signatures for outgoing mail.

autoReply.TITLE: Auto-reply
autoReply.DESC: Set an auto-reply message to all incoming email.
autoReply.REPLY_ONCE_DESC: Send a reply once to each sender
autoReply.DOMAINS_DESC: Send a different response to email from specific domains, e.g. example.com, company.com. To specify several, separate each one with a comma.
